CAREERS

Join Our Mission

Help us revolutionize the way people approach job searching with AI-powered resume optimization technology.

No Current Openings

We don't have any job openings at the moment, but we're always growing and looking for exceptional talent to join our team.

Interested in Future Opportunities?

We'd love to hear from you! Send us your resume and a note about what role you're interested in. We'll keep your information on file and reach out when the right opportunity becomes available.

kash@resumeit.ai

What We Look For

When we do have openings, here's what we typically value in potential team members.

Innovation Mindset

Passion for creating cutting-edge AI solutions that solve real-world problems in career development.

Technical Excellence

Strong technical skills in areas like AI/ML, web development, cloud infrastructure, or data science.

User-Centric Approach

Deep empathy for job seekers and a commitment to creating products that genuinely help people succeed.

Follow our journey and be the first to know when new opportunities become available.
